item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: {r echo=FALSE} # library(rbokeh) # figure() %>% # ly_points(Sepal.Length, Sepal.Width, data = iris, # color = Species, glyph = Species, # hover = list(Sepal.Length, Sepal.Width)) # # {r echo=FALSE} # library(rgl) # library(rglwidget) # library(htmltools) # {r, test-rgl, webgl=TRUE} # x <- sort(rnorm(1000)) # y <- rnorm(1000) # z <- rnorm(1000) + atan2(x,y) # plot3d(x, y, z, col = rainbow(1000)) # ## Loading required package: plotly ## Loading required package: ggplot2 ## ## Attaching package: 'plotly' ## The following object is masked from 'package:ggplot2': ## ## last_plot ## The following object is masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter ## The following object is masked from 'package:graphics': ## ## layout ## Warning: package 'plotly' is in use and will not be installed ## Warning: `arrange_()` is deprecated as of dplyr 0.
